channel.title: Projects on Simon Gorbet
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Simon Gorbet

item.title: Safe Sensor Drivers Using Rust's Type System
item.author: simon@gorbet.com (Simon Gorbet)
item.description: Using the typestate design pattern with Rust’s compiler to enforce proper hardware configuration.

item.title: SiTerm: Embedded Development Tool
item.author: simon@gorbet.com (Simon Gorbet)
item.description: A TUI+Adapter that allows you to interface your laptop via USB to downstream systems and transfer serial messages using I2C, SPI, and UART.

item.title: BananaHand: Open Source Anthropomorphic Robotic Hand
item.author: simon@gorbet.com (Simon Gorbet)
item.description: An open-source humanoid hand that combines proportional design, dexterity, tactile sensing, and affordability.

item.title: Anti-Anti Masker Mask [Hackathon: Winner]
item.author: simon@gorbet.com (Simon Gorbet)
item.description: A wearable system that detects nearby unmasked individuals and automatically launches soft darts to enforce social distancing. Built in 24 hours during covid.
